arts.ttl: Exeter beat Shrewsbury to end wait for home win
arts.sum: Caleb Watts and Demetri Mitchell scored in a 2-0 success.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town: Who is missing for Exeter clash?
arts.sum: Last weekend's game at the Weston Homes stadium was not only costly from a points perspective, but Pierre also picked up a suspension. He will miss this game and another relegation six-pointer against Burton Albion next weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Exeter City vs. Shrewsbury Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Exeter City and Shrewsbury Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
